channel.title: Api on Tech Insights
channel.description: Recent content in Api on Tech Insights

item.title: HTTP Headers: Complete Guide to Secure & Optimize Your APIs
item.description: Running a production API without properly configured HTTP headers is leaving your front door unlocked. Browsers block modern features, CDNs refuse to cache your responses and attackers can exploit XSS, clickjacking and CSRF vulnerabilities in seconds.

item.title: HTTP Headers: Complete Guide to Secure & Optimize Your APIs
item.description: Running a production API without properly configured HTTP headers is leaving your front door unlocked. Browsers block modern features, CDNs refuse to cache your responses and attackers can exploit XSS, clickjacking and CSRF vulnerabilities in seconds.
